/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. In the distance, you can see buildings and a field, adding to the urban landscape. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
